content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my two dogs outside for a routine nightly bathroom break, clear night sky, 
on the side that my dogs usually go potty on i looked up and noticed a very oddly bright to what i fist thought to just be anther star be i then noticed how it was flicking very quickly so i kept my eye on it knowing that it was unusual than the most of the stars around it, about the same size but much brighter white than then rest of them but, at one point it was flickering different colors but not 100% sure what colors they were, think i tried to communicate by using my thoughts, and it would respond instantly, one point it went down it the motion of a leaf, and then stopped, i was skiing my head no and  would imitate my motions, i was trying to speak to it to see its reactions and it would just stay still while i was talking to it as if it was trying to understand not sure but i felt a connection with it as if it was waiting for me to go outside to see it... my feelings towards it were neutral i didn't feel that it was good or bad... i just wasn't sure what else i could do in my situation that i was in so i just went inside and kinda just thought about what i should do, i don't have a good camera that could have been able to see it so i just went nine to report it, after i came in.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Walking my dog outside for nightly bathroom break before bed, noticed a very bright white light at least 10 miles up in the sky, flickering led color white light communicating and reacting to my thoughts, falling like a leaf, and dividing into two.

content.detailedDescription: Look in the upper two sun parts
content.summary: Was taking pic and this was there

content.detailedDescription:
It was a weeknight, wednesday i believe was the day, about 1:20am in the morning, we are retired and at the time lived in a 24 apartment complex in augusta kentucky, most people there are retired or disabled in some way, so many sit up late and in warm weather as it was that night were up late and we usually like to sit outside, my wife and i were watching tv, when we heard activity in the hallway, we went out and 1 neighbor said they were watching a large lighted object rising up from the river, but you could not see the river, only over the tops of the houses in town, then you knew where the river was, they said it had risin up as they were sitting out front, about 8 neighbors, men, women, ages varied from 23 to 55, i went out with them and we all saw what appeared to be a large object with lights, just hovering what appeared to be the river in the same spot, they said they saw it rise up from, it was about 4 miles or so at most from our building to the river, but you could tell it was a large object on a clear night.
i ran back to my apartment and told my wife and that i was going to get in the van and drive down to check it out, she was not dressed for a ride, so she stayed home, i told the other neighbors i was heading down there and to keep an eye on it.
i drove down to 2nd street about 4 1/2 blocks down, the street directly across from our apartment driveway entrance, the next street over is river drive the main road that goes by the river, before i got to that next block right at 2nd street, this huge object flew over the trees between those 2 streets and i stopped, it was going straight in the direction i had just come from and coming from the river, it was moving very slowly, i turned right and began moving up 2nd street, it was just barely above the trees, i turned to my left onto 2nd street and followed it, i got directly under it.
i had my head out the window as i drove with 1 hand, watching it all the way down 2nd street, at least 4 or 5 blocks, i don't remember my speed, but i was barely moving, as it was just slowly moving, i got to the 4-way stop in augusta at the intersection of 2nd & main street.
i stopped at the stop sign, and the object stopped above the 4 corner intersect, just barely above the buildings, i think it stopped 1st then i stopped at the stop sign, to my right is a 2 story building that is an old antique store, to the left is a 20 car or so parking lot, across from that lot and to the far left corner from me is a 2 story old style old time bank, us bank, it'a a good sized old style bank, to the far right corner is a very small park with a few trees and bench, then down each side of the street are rows or stores and buildings, all about 2 story.

this object was just above the builds, i was 52 at the time, if i had had a baseball, i probably could have just above thrown it high enough to hit the object, i looked all over for anyone, usually this down dies down by 9pm on a weeknight as nothing remains open, and only on weekends at certain days is a police officer on duty that time of night, i saw no one, i wanted to yell to get their attention if i had, this object just sat stationary above me, of course it seemed like awhile, but i would say less than 2 minutes, or maybe even 1 minute, i got out of my van and stood directly under it and i could see it as clearly as any of the buildings, the town has lights and they did not hinder my view of the object.

the size was bigger than all 4 corners and the bank, the parking lot, the store on the other corner and the park, it probably extended down another 2 or more buildings down in size.

the shape was triangle, but all 3 corner, were flat not pointed, the flat corners were long flat ends, definitely several feet in length, just on these 3 flat ends of the triangle.

it had a row of lights all the way around it, spread out, not on the edge, but just a little bit inside the edge, it had no markings, no windows i could see, nothing that looked like a door, but it had ridges all over it, it appeared to be like some type of metal, it looked dark, it had a solid heavy build look to it, the ridges looked like thick steel structure or some type of metal, i have always been a military plane person, i love models and books and history on them, and also naval ships, warships from the civil war on up, and the thing that reminded me most of the outside look of this thing, was an old civil war ironclad, that sort of very thick looking old type of metal with a lot of ridges spaced out around it, it was nowhere near a smooth structure like any military or space rocket or anything i had ever previously scene, i describe it best as a huge iron looking triangle shape with lights, just solid and heavy looking, i could not get a good view of the height as i was directly under it.

i yelled at it, i think i said, who are you, is anyway inside, can you hear me., after a minute or 2 at most if that, it turned left and headed up main street, it started from the ohio river direction, which was noth of my position, when it went down 2nd street that was heading west, when turned and headed up main street that was south.

the entire time, i never heard a sound, it was a quiet, non windy night, i could have heard a pin drop, other than myself and my van, even as it moved and as it sat stationary, it never made 1 single sound, it never emitted anything, no gas, no stream,nothing, that amazed me at the time besides the fact of what i was seeing.

i followed up main street to 4the street where you must turn left or right, or vear to the right and go up that short street to the main road on route 8, which comes out at the local gas station with a store init, it was closed.

as it got closer to 4th street it picked up speed, on the other side of route 8, just behind the gas station and all down that side of route 8 is a big set of hills/mountains, not huge but good sized, as it reached 4th street it was picking up speed and i could not keep up, and it was also lifting in height at the same time, by the time it hit route 8 and crossed it, it was lifting to a height that sent it up and over the hills and it was moving much faster and disappeared over the hills quickly and it was gone.

i went back to the apartments and my wife and everyone were still out watching, they had been watching it the whole time and could see it, and everything i told them, they all said they could see the object doing just what i had described, they could not fully tell what it was, as just appeared like a huge darker object with lights around it to them, from that distance they could not make out anywhere near the details i did.

i was glad they observed the whole thing, it confirmed to me, that i was not going crazy and that i really did see what i know that i saw, for some reason, i just did not seem to get the feeling it was any type of alien spacecraft, growing up i had always had an interest in ufo's, but the shape of this, and the look and surface of it, was nothing like any ufo i had ever read or see photos of or seen in a movie or anything, i was more use to seeing a saucer or cigar shape or something along those lines, and something with more of a smoother surface, maybe for that reason, i thought this might be man made.

but i have never seen or heard or read about anything we have like this.

i was also never scared of it and never got any scared or bad feelings the whole time, i was excited and slightly nervous as i had no idea what it was or who was driving this thing, i thought for a moment if it were alien, i could be in trouble, and then if it were military, i still could be in trouble. but mostly i just concentrated on the object, i have always been a very calm person, always the one to go to in an emergency as i am always, calm, cool an collected, that's what has made me a good security person and a good baseball umpire and a sports coach in high school, i am always calm in any situation, and always observing and being aware of what and who is around me.

my final thoughts, and what struck me most, it was just above the trees initially and then the buildings, which were all about the same height, it was huge, again looked thick and solid built, no sound at all, it could move slow enough if i had been walking i could have kept up, yet it hovered stationary with no sound at all, and then it could pick up enough speed and height to quickly disappear of the nearby hills again without making a single sound of any kind, it was clearly the most amazing thing i had ever seen, and since it was so close to me, i made no mistake about exactly and 100% what i described above was what i had seen.

my background is, i graduated hs, went 2 years to a vocational school for law enforcement to be a police officer, got married had 4 kids, lived in cincinnati, ohio most of my life, got a job at the post office and worked for nearly 20 years there, before retiring early, and went into security, where i was loss prevention director at a marriot hotel in cincinnati for 3 years before getting injured on the job by 2 thugs that broke in and assaulted and injured me, i've been reitred here in augusta since, we have since moved up and over the line of hills i described here, and we live on a road near the top of these hills now, for 3 years, since that incident.

i was the only witness to be that close to it, but at least 8 others including my wife were back in the apartment parking lot watching it from there the whole time.

at that time, i had the old style flip phone and nothing to take a photo with.

i have made no attachments to this record, but if needed i can send at anytime my drawing of the object, but i think i gave a pretty good descriptin

thank you
rob spencer
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed 4 miles away rising from ohio river, drove to check it out!

content.detailedDescription: Event had two different sightings.  first while traveling east on the 10 freeway noticed what looked like a falling meteor with tail then slowed down to a hover for about fifteen seconds then diapered.  the second sighting was observed while traveling north on verado way one object was witnessed falling about 20 deg. above the horizon, while falling one object split into about five to seven objects then stayed there for about 30 or so seconds then we drove out of view.
content.summary: Falling orb then hovered, then diapered

content.detailedDescription:
I was asked to submit this report from one of your members.
in 1966 i was 10 years old and riding in a car with the parents of our close neighbors, along with their 4 children.  we were headed home after going to downtown anchorage to the movies.  at this time of year it was very dark and the area at that time was lightly populated.  there was a house on the west side of jewel lake road one block further south than 84th avenue, which was owned by a well-known ham radio operator. he had multiple, very high antennas, with blinking red lights. as we crested the hill at sand lake elementary school, all of us, and nd i mean all 7 of us observed a grey/bright flying sauce-like, domed object hovering over the ham radio operator's house.  we drove towards it for several minutes, with the adults gasping and crying out "it's a ufo".  we turned east onto 84th avenue, the street where both mine and their houses were located.  the object never moved, just hovered and it just got bigger as we approached then veered away to go home. my family remain friends with this family and the father has since died, but i can assure, whenever we get together, we talk about the time we saw an ufo.  thanks for your service.  cathy
content.summary: 1966 sighting of ufo by 7 people

content.detailedDescription: I might as well tell you my story before i get too old. i am 50 years old and this happened to me in 1973, when i was 8 years old. it was in july, mid afternoon, blue sky andn i was playing outside with a few friends on a gravel lot near my home. the cicadas were cranking up the volume, announcing the heatwave that day. in one instant, everything changed. no more cicada sounds, no birds sounds, insects, nothing. the air around us fell dead silent. what followed immediately after was a tremedous electrical sound, like static filling the air and our bodies. it was so loud that i covered my ears while staring up in the air to find the culprit of this deafening noise....And i did. staring at 45 degrees up, over my friends house, the sky just..Opened. i say opened because what i saw were metal discs appearing in the cloudless sky, one after the other in a triangle formation. i will never be sure of the exact amount of discs that appeared but it was either 3 or 5 of them and in a triangle formation. they were solid, shiny silver discs, maybe 30 feet in diameter. they were about 50 feet up in the air, just a little above tall tree level and they were very slowly coming right above my head. the only adult that i know saw them was the mother of 2 friends that were with me. she came out of her house screaming at the top of her lungs to get her kids in the house. me? i just stood there, frozen. i cannot remember being scared, but i do remember my body feeling numb from the static noise all around me. as they were approaching me, i could see the reflection of the street on the bottom of the discs. sadly, this is all i can remember of this event. i have no recollection of ever speaking of this to anyone that day. my mind is still blank. this was 1 of 3 major similar events that happened to me that summer. to this day, only one person knows my story. at the age of 49 ( last year), what i thought were 3 distinct , separate events, all meshed into 1 singular event, but that is another story. weird the first word that comes to mind while writing this, but i do think that writing my story is the right thing to do. thank you
content.summary: Afternoon disc apparition triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: I just saw an oval black object zoom across the sky going east. no sound. there was 2 airplanes in the sky that i heard but this thing was silent and every bit as big as the jets
content.summary: Large oval shape no sound went in a eastern directionn very fasr. as big as the jets in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
There was a home on fire, i heard it on the scanner. 
so i tried to find where it was because my daughter lives near by. 
i just wanted to make sure it wasn't close to her home. 
when i punched the address up, this is what i got on google earth.
content.summary: I was looking of a house in google earth and this was on it.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch i first noticed it when i was looking out side in to the sky. an airplane but then i realized airplanes cant go that fast. up down side ways far up then feel down. i told my friend about it then set my phone out on recording aimed at were it did it so i could go in and search stuff about it then i come back 5 mins later and my phone caught recording of an anteater tiny fat looking alien. i lost sight becase it disapred  ether to the sky or the ground.
content.summary: Kept and going up and down and side ways and off then back down

content.detailedDescription: Deep orange dot hovered high floating downward w speed acceleration and trail grew w speed.Object ejected portions of itself into approx 7 identical from my distance crafts.Less than 2 mins after falling below tree line sw sky was totally illuminated from what appeared to be an explosion.Could see bright orange glow in or past luke air force base.My cell phone camera and camera record funcion were grayed out, htc m9 one verizon, and i have never had that happen for the entire year ive had this phone. it actually works great. seemed planned but dont know... th unavailability of media capture seemed planned. lime a hack almost. for the entire time i only got a tinylessbthan 2 min video that barely shows anything. 2 other witnesses with me including an ex vietnam veteran.
content.summary: Something entering nw az atmoaphere glowing orange splits and nto multiple crafts identical save for smaller size then explodeds near lafb. whole sky lit up

content.detailedDescription: At 8:25 pm on i-5 south closest exit was las pulgas road west of camp pendleton my dad was driving and was looking out to the waters and noticed that there was this odd patters on my window and thought it was a reflection so i rolled down my window and realised it was not a reflection. it was 2 different objects that had 3 light blue lights in a straight line and in the midlin of each craft a faint red light. objects moving south to north following the coast. could not pull over as there was too much traffic and some barricades. the 2 objects where blurryer than in the recreation. (i dont know if it lwt me post the recreation but if you want it just email me)
content.summary: 2 sets of 3 blue lights with a red light in the middle of each craft.

content.detailedDescription: Was smoking on my porch facing southeast and saw lights blinking thought it was a plane but as i watched the lights realized it was blinking along an arced shape and at times it was fully lighted. observed in same spot for 45 mins and neighbor confirmed seeing the same thing. left for work but elevation changed and i could no longer see the object.
content.summary: Blinking red blue green and white lights that moved around an arc for 45 mins. tried viewing from other location and lost sight of the object

content.detailedDescription: This is a story that goes back years.It's starts when i was about 8 i woke up in my aunt's house and the electronics were going crazy a little human type figure but it was see thru just walked around my bed it created like trials or ripples as it walked then it just dissapeared.I began suffering from sleep paralysis and was having dreams of places i'd never been but started researching these places and they exsisted..Then i was having note made and starting becoming very psychic.. it was horrible time in my life i could feel things what ppl felt what they were thinking..Then i started seeing shadows robs and light type water beings anywhere i love these days.. i'm constantly experiencing paranormal activity no matter what home i love in.. now when i take pictures of myself you can actually see a face of something else over my face..I've gotten several pictures of entity.Cause i can see them with my eyes and in my periphery so i've started snapping pictures of them.. the one is always with me.. his name is ebboth..He's the one in the picture i sent you.He'll even speak thru my tv,speakers etc.. i've had ariel pictures of me taking on my phone of me when i've been sleeping and they just seem to imprint themselves on my phone.. there's a lot more..I just wanna know at this point cause it's getting really outta control.My toaster oven which is huge flew off my kitchen counter and landing in the middle of the floor..They,he,it have never hurt me i'm scared during sleep paralysis and get some dull numbing drilling pain in my back a bit.. guess it's just scary.. and then also anytime i take picture myself if my eyes are closed in the pictures you'll see other eyes over them..And also i experience giant blue brute like whit/ blue so brite flashes sometimes in my room or places and they just so brute with no explanation cause nothing could make such a brite flash.Here's one picture..
content.summary: it's such a long story but now this entity is showing up in my pictures alot.. there's orbs,l,shadow people a reptile type being.... ..

content.detailedDescription: Well i was standing outside looking to the nw and i seen what i thought was mars it had a orange reddish color, but then it occurred to me that it was not mars at all cause mars is on the other side of the sky, i was thinking to my self what am i looking at then, i am a avid night sky watcher and all of a sudden it just started to move very slow and graceful a straight like from nw to ne and as it moved it stayed the same size it was very high in the night sky but as it got farther away size of the light stayed the same i called my family out they looked at it and had never seen anything like it. no faa lights nothing just a perfect color at all times no fluctuations in the light no dimming it just glided across the sky so smooth very slow then kept going ne and it dimmed out was out of sight.
content.summary: Star like

content.detailedDescription:
I had taken  pictures of the surroundings while on a train ride in jim thorpe. i hadn't noticed the object until just recently while going through the pictures to put on my fb page. (02/16/2016)this when i noticed the object in the photo. it was a nice day, partly cloudy.
i was on vacation with family at the time.I was shocked to see the object and i posted on my fb as a cover photo for my friends to see. others who saw the photo  thought it was a leaf(1) person who is a skeptic.I wasn't expecting to see anything other than trees and the ridge line of the surrounding valley.I was awestruck that i actually caught a ufo in a photo.
content.summary: Most people i have shown this to say it looks like a leaf

content.detailedDescription: First the sky flashed then this starlike figure appeared. we where not afraid because we see them a lot in our region. it was bright orange of color and it just hoovered
content.summary: First the sky flashed, then this starlike ufo appeared out of nowhere. it just hovered

content.detailedDescription: We were in our backyard watching the iss fly overhead. the object came up behind the iss going twice the speed. when we first noticed it we thought it was a ufo. the object was flying very fast in a sw to ne direction and seemed to come up directly behind the iss purposefully.Our reactions were that we weren't sure what we were seeing and shocked that we were seeing it. we lost sight of the object when it went behind the clouds.
content.summary: Watching iss saw bluish object flying at twice the speed come behind the iss and then went behind the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
The night was clear and cold with lots of stars out.  it was about 11:20 p.M. and standing on the back porch, i seen a big red light hiding in the trees slightly moving but stationary.Then, we seen small white lights fly off together. i don't know if it was just the one red light that morphed into the little lights or what so i put "unknown" instead of "1" object viewed.

i was outside visiting the cats on the porch when, without looking up into the sky but glancing at the neighbor's house to the east, i seen a big red light, bigger than a basketball, looked like it was 3 and a half feet tall, in neighbour b's yard. it was right in with the tree height, not higher than the tree.  this is neighbor b's yard from a previous sighting in december 2015.

the light was round or oval-oval shaped and emitted a faint glow.

i looked at it for a few seconds. it seemed to be hiding behind the tree but wanted to be seen as it was a big red light.

i went in the house and told my sister really fast. when we went back outside quickly, the red light was gone.

she came out and seen low flying small lights going east. i seen 2 low flying white lights going east that seemed to be flying in tandem. we both were looking in the western sky as they traveled away.

we were standing outside, armed with not much, but armed, in case it wanted to land. i put myself in an enraged state to keep them away. i dislike them, don't want them pests to land here.

anyways, it flew off.
content.summary: Red light emitting with slight glow hiding behind tree in neighbor's yard, then seen other low-flying lights fly off.

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 10pm [pacific] on thursday, march 24th. we were driving about 60mph north on us 97 in washington state, near the city of toppenish by dry creek. there were 4 people in our car and we were discussing how pretty the stars were and how halley's comet tails might be seen later in april, when all of a sudden, the two front passengers [myself and the driver] saw a large'ish [penny-sized] pulsating/twinkling orb fairly low in the sky, travel from [above] the front of our car to the back and then disappear. it came out of nowhere; it just appeared. i blinked a few times and asked the driver if he saw it and we both agreed we saw the same thing and described it the same way as well.  our passengers did not see it, but heard me exclaim and look to the rear of the car to track its path. we were at milepost 49 and the ufo was to the west of us. i'm not sure what i thought it was, everything ran through my mind from airplane lights do a possible drone.  nothing fit logically. i tried to report it online via my cell phone, but reception was bad and it was cumbersome.  i let it go until today, april 1st [not a joke!] because it is sticking with me.  i know we saw something unusual that we've never seen before.
content.summary: The orange/pink glowing penny-sized orb moved in a straight line above our car to the back, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Arrived home last night and as i drove into my driveway i saw a bright light up in the sky ahead of me.  approximated 50 degrees up, clear night so not sure what the actual distance up was.  first glance i thought it was a star, but as i exited my car and watched it, i noticed it was slowly moving in a n/ne direct.  seemed to quiver and was not moving in a straight line.  as i walked into my backyard to get a closer look, the object appeared to make a 90 degree turn to the east and quickly dimmed and vanished as though it sped quickly away and/or upward. the time was 9:16 pm.

i have seen these type of objects before so the pattern of the movement was familiar and similar to prior sightings.  i had several sightings of this sort last summer.  the first of this such object was almost a year ago to date.  

reaction was mostly excitement and intrigue as again, this is not my first sighting of these objects in this area.  at the time, and even back to these moments of describing the sighting, i get goosebumps, a chill down my back and a bottomless feeling in my stomach.
content.summary: Bright star like object wavering movement slowly across sky, changed direction 90 degree away and quickly vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to the supermarket, just in front of my place i saw some "stars" with a weird red color. what i found very strange already. but when i stopped walking and i just stood there watching those "stars" and i realized they were moving. first they were 3-4, after few seconds more appeared from nowhere. it took me awhile to react and i tried to record the event with my phone but my phone does not have the necessary quality. before i lost eye contact i try to run behind them but they literally vanished into the sky one by one. not a sound !! 
one of them was close enough to distinguish between parts of the object with different light intensities.
content.summary: 7-8 red balls in the sky flying together. they change direction noiselessly. after a few minutes they vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Follow-up to case #75502 and an ongoing event since first seen again this year on march 27th 2016. they are still appearing regularly albeit fewer in number. i only witnessed 2 last night around 10:00pm. i was unsuccessful in trying to video and photograph these things - the tripod was too wobbly and the camera is not designed for the type of night sky filming. the following new details maybe helpful. the constellation that the objects most often appear in is canis major. the bright object i thought was jupiter is actually the brightest star in the northern hemisphere sky, sirius. i need more eyes looking for these objects i call "sbrats." i have provided a constellation map which should have enough details to allow others to look for these things. unlike satellites and meteors the sbrats appear to maneuver as well as shoot-off in a straight line at incredible speed.
content.summary: Re-occuring phenomenon. seen 4 different days out of last 5. satellite or meteor like but can change speed and direction in an instant.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing some wood working in my shop in the backyard. i could her a loud humming sound. i was not using and machines that night i was carving. when i first saw it i ran back and retrieved my phone. when i first seen it i new it was not normal. the object was  shaped like something shaped as a boomerang / triangle. it was hovered over a group of houses a cross the street. it was making a loud humming sound that started to change to a vacuum sound.  it was moving  very slowly  then changed direction to the west. i was trying to get a good picture of it. as i was taking a picture it made weird noises like a swishing sound then it was gone. i was pretty shocked over the whole thing. i could not get it out of my mind for a few weeks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A humming object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Huge,kind of dark see through craft or projection which held direction, circular patterns underneath on flyby....Silent, almost invisible. but it was something...I've never seen such a stealthy visual object...Don't know...That's why i'm just unsure, but needed to report. looked like a giant sting ray floating by, with circular colored pattern. idk man..Mirabeau park area supposedly hosted jurassic type dinosaur creatures. i'm educated, with multiple degrees in electronics and audio...Or call me incompetent. i know what i saw. peace on earth.
content.summary: Huge,kind of see through craft or projection which held direction, circular patterns underneath flyby

content.detailedDescription: I took my iphone 6s and filed have 3 videos, outside having s cigarette both husband and i saw, we seen  one other time about 2-weeks ago but saw only one, last night saw 3. my video of 3 videos show all directions moving. my iphone video shows only light moving around but didn't show colors  and disc object we saw. used also to very strong binoculars to confirm colors and shape, naked eye looked like a very bright diamond shape star moving hovering in many different directions, stopped then move fast to and fro
content.summary: Blue and pink lights disc

content.detailedDescription:
These objects were very common here in 2012 virtualy every week. a large white ball in the sky always at night verylow and no noise.I personaly witnessed over 15 of these objects over a period of several months. infact they were so common i stopped counting.Most of my family have witnessed these with me and some of my friends. i tried to photo the objects but with little success.I managed to catch them on film in broad daylight by accident, i was fiming a military plane flying over my house when i watched the film on the computer i noticed the objects.I couldnt see them whilst filming because of the contrast against the blue sky. since 2012  i have only seen about 5 of these flying at night.I live in an area which has a lot of ufo activity, in 1995 one landed a few kms away and left a large mark on the ground. in the 70s there was a lot of landings in the area one left a mark on the ground which took 20 years to   disappere.
i hope you find this information usefull.
                   tim
content.summary: White balls of light above military plane. 3 objects regroupe and change direction 1 follows the plane

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the night sky above portland or from clearing in gifford pinchot forest. above the jones creek orv park. could see planes coming into pdx. i noticed a bright flash in high in the south.Like that of a camera flash.Then it was gone. i watched the area of sky i saw it in. and then again a flash. brighter than any star and slowly faded out. about a minute later there seemed to be a bright star near to where the flash had been. it did not flash like before. it was just there and slowly dimmed out.It did this maybe 15 times. moving to the north. the length of time between the light flashes were irregular not like a plane. and out of the 15 times the light came on and slowly dimmed out. it flashed as bright as it had the first 2 times, 3 other times. it did not seem to have any pattern to it. and the speed did not seem to be consistent.Several times when it reappeared it seemed to be in the same spot it had been previously. after the last time it came on and dimmed out. i did not see it again.

i have seen planes at night. both small and large. i've seen satellites cross the sky. ive not seen anything close to this before. the color of the light was that like a camera flash. not the yellow that airliners have. the object was very high.
content.summary: Bright flash then slowly dimmed out. again and again

content.detailedDescription: I was camping outside of death valley for spring flowers. it was about 11pm-12am spent the evening looking at the stars, and the occasional satellite overhead. there where some small aircraft flying with their tell tale beacons flashing, which i have seen thousands of times. during this star gazing. i noticed a craft traveling slowly in a northeast direction. 75-80 degrees in the air. it had a light pattern i have never seen before. it would pulse a light every 10 seconds, and it did not flash like a traditional aircraft beacon. it was like it was on a dimmer switch being toggled on. the duration of the pulse was about 2-2.5 seconds. after observing this pulse a couple of times, i noticed that when the light was off i could faintly observe that the craft was a darkish grey to the black background of the night sky. i watched this craft for about 2 minutes. it never strayed from its course or changed speed while on course my question are there private/commercial aircraft that have this type of light pattern?
content.summary: A light in the sky every ten seconds,

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside. overcast. noticed a long oval shaped black spot in the clouds. wathched for approx 30 seconds and called girlfriend out to see. as soon as i told her, it began to appear to ascend through the clouds. she only saw it for about 10 seconds as it disappeared. freaked her out, though. i look at the sky every night and this was definitely strange. most of the sky was a solid patch of clouds with no breaks and this spot (darker than the night sky) was very visible until i told someone to check it out.
content.summary: Black spot in overcast sky.

content.detailedDescription: In a remote canyon in the cerbat mtns while 4 wheeling we stopped in a valley maybe a mile across and i was looking for game through my binoculars . as the sun set over the mountain top i noticed a distinct pattern on the slope  in rear of canyon. as the light changed a bit darker i noticed movement of a very large area of the background . then distinctly i noticed 2 black winged things that resembled some type of kite one in front of the other. as it continued to get darker a pattern appeared as if almost ancient mayan / aztec . there was something large out there and it was now to dark to see and my girlfriend was freaking so we drove out. curious as to what i saw i returned into the canyon with a friend after work the next afternoon to have another look at the area. we noticed the same pattern at rear of canyon and waited until the sun set again to see if anything changed. again as the sun set and it shaded the valley the pattern on the terrain became different again except this time a definite shape was visible as it hovered maybe 100' to 200' above valley floor. as the area got a bit darker we could both see a very large triangular shape craft  slowly moving across the valley floor ,south to north. it was very strange looking with a pattern of gold to dark rusty metal , covered with some ancient type of signs or writing , not sure looked aztec/ mayan. off the front was some type of boom structure with the 2 black winged objects i had seen the night before. it made no sound and as it slowly moved the darkness made it vanish before our eyes. 2 min later we did see a row of sequential lights appear moving above the mountain in front of us in a westerly direction. as we drove out there were 4 aircraft flying east to west and north to south patterns  over the area. returned a 3 rd night to the valley and there was no sign of anything as we had seen previously.
content.summary: While off roading in mtns 1 mile into a very secluded canyon we found and sighted something silloetted against the back side of canyon. whitnessed it 2 nights in a row
